item.title: Core
item.description: My core CLI app. More details can be found on the GitHub repository.

item.title: Now
item.description:
I’m on Christmas break so I’m trying to focus on some personal projects and my hobbies. Also trying to finally make some progress on the flat search.

Software Development

Working on core and trying to improve my Go skills in general.

Giving Rust another try. Reading through the book slowly and once I feel like I have a grasp of the basics, I’ll start with tidysync.

Reading

Reading Between Two Fires by Christopher Buehlman. It’s a historical fantasy/horror novel set during the Black Plague.
